contacts.info: Note: There are 2 ways to store address contacts: (1) you can either fill out contacts directly, (2) you can link a partner account, and then fill out contacts. The difference between both is that account contacts can be invited, e.g. for giving them access to shipments for their locations, whereas direct contacts can't be invited.

actions.release: Are you sure you want to release the tender? - This action will send out invite emails to all participants.
actions.setToDraft: Are you sure you want to put the tender in draft status? - Participants will loose access.
actions.setToReview: Are you sure you want to put the tender in review status? - Participants will still be able to access their bids, but are not allowed to make any changes.
actions.close: Are you sure you want to close the tender? - Participants will loose access.
actions.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this tender? - The tender will no longer be available for bidders, this action is irreversable

warning.draft: Warning when setting your tender back to draft all bidders will loose access. Proceed?
warning.open: Warning: when setting the status to open, all bidders will be notified and can place their bids. Proceed?
warning.review: Waring: when setting the status to review, no new bids can be received. Bidders will still be able to view their bids. Proceed?
warning.closed: Warning: when setting the status to closed, no new bids can be received. Bidders will still be able to view their bids. Proceed?
warning.canceled: Warning: when setting the status to canceled, the bidders will be notified and will no longer have access to the tender. Proceed?

warning.accessLong: No access to this tender, please request permission.
